title: Reverse a String
problem: Write a function that reverses a given string.
output: The reversed string

title: Find the Maximum Element in an Array
problem: Write a function that finds the maximum element in an array of integers.
output: The maximum integer in the array. If the array is empty, return -1.

title: Check if a Number is Palindrome
problem: Write a function that checks if a given integer is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards).
output: true if it’s a palindrome, false otherwise

title: Sum of Even Numbers
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of all even numbers in an array.
output: The sum of even numbers in the array

title: Count Vowels in a String
problem: Write a function that counts the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in a string (case-insensitive).
output: The number of vowels in the string

title: Check if a String is All Uppercase
problem: Write a function that checks if all alphabetic characters in a string are uppercase.
output: true if all alphabetic characters are uppercase, false otherwise. Non-alphabetic characters are ignored.

title: Find the Second Largest Number
problem: Write a function that finds the second largest number in an array of integers.
output: The second largest number, or -1 if it doesn’t exist (e.g., array has fewer than 2 distinct elements).

title: Remove Duplicates from an Array
problem: Write a function that removes duplicates from an array and returns the unique elements.
output: An array with unique integers (order doesn’t matter)

title: Check if Two Strings are Anagrams
problem: Write a function that checks if two strings are anagrams (contain the same characters with the same frequency).
output: true if they are anagrams, false otherwise

title: Find the Missing Number
problem: Given an array of integers from 1 to n with one number missing, find the missing number.
input: An array arr of length n-1 containing unique integers from 1 to n
output: The missing integer

title: Calculate Factorial
problem: Write a function that calculates the factorial of a non-negative integer.
output: The factorial of n (n!). Return -1 if n is negative.

title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
problem: Write a function that merges two sorted arrays into one sorted array.
input: Two sorted arrays arr1 and arr2
output: A single sorted array containing all elements

title: Check if a Number is Prime
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is prime.
output: true if n is prime, false otherwise

title: Reverse Words in a Sentence
problem: Write a function that reverses the order of words in a sentence.
input: A string s containing words separated by spaces
output: A string with the words in reverse order

title: Find the Longest Word
problem: Write a function that finds the longest word in a sentence. If multiple words have the same length, return the first one.
input: A string s containing words separated by spaces
output: The longest word

title: Sum of Digits
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of digits in a given integer.
output: The sum of its digits

title: Fibonacci Number
problem: Write a function that returns the nth Fibonacci number (0-based index).
output: The nth Fibonacci number. Return -1 if n is negative.

title: Count Occurrences of a Character
problem: Write a function that counts the occurrences of a specific character in a string.
input: A string s and a character c
output: The number of times c appears in s

title: Is Power of Two
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a power of 2.
output: true if n is a power of 2, false otherwise

title: Rotate Array Right
problem: Write a function that rotates an array to the right by k steps.
input: An array arr and an integer k
output: The rotated array

title: Check Balanced Parentheses
problem: Write a function that checks if a string of parentheses is balanced.
input: A string s containing only '(' and ')'
output: true if balanced, false otherwise

title: Find First Duplicate
problem: Write a function that finds the first duplicate in an array.
output: The first duplicate number, or -1 if no duplicates

title: Convert to Binary
problem: Write a function that converts a decimal integer to its binary representation as a string.
output: The binary string representation

title: Find GCD
problem: Write a function that finds the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two integers.
output: The GCD of a and b

title: Capitalize First Letter
problem: Write a function that capitalizes the first letter of each word in a string.
output: The string with each word's first letter capitalized

title: Find Minimum Difference
problem: Write a function that finds the minimum difference between any two elements in an array.
output: The minimum difference, or -1 if less than 2 elements

title: Check if Sorted
problem: Write a function that checks if an array is sorted in ascending order.
output: true if sorted, false otherwise

title: Replace Spaces
problem: Write a function that replaces all spaces in a string with '%20'.
output: The string with spaces replaced

title: Find Pair with Sum
problem: Write a function that finds a pair of numbers in an array that add up to a target sum.
input: An array arr and an integer target
output: An array of two indices [i, j] where arr[i] + arr[j] = target, or [-1, -1] if no pair exists

title: Reverse Integer
problem: Write a function that reverses an integer. Return 0 if the result overflows a 32-bit signed integer.
output: The reversed integer

title: Find Length of Last Word
problem: Write a function that finds the length of the last word in a string.
output: The length of the last word

title: Square Root (Integer)
problem: Write a function that returns the integer square root of a number (floor value).
output: The largest integer whose square is <= n

title: Check if Substring
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is a substring of another string.
output: true if s2 is a substring of s1, false otherwise

title: Count Primes
problem: Write a function that counts the number of prime numbers less than n.
output: The count of primes less than n

title: Move Zeroes to End
problem: Write a function that moves all zeroes in an array to the end while maintaining the relative order of non-zero elements.
output: The modified array

title: Longest Consecutive 1s
problem: Write a function that finds the longest sequence of consecutive 1s in the binary representation of a number.
output: The length of the longest sequence of 1s

title: Swap Case
problem: Write a function that swaps the case of each character in a string.
output: The string with swapped case

title: Product Except Self
problem: Write a function that returns an array where each element is the product of all numbers in the input array except the one at that index.
output: The resulting array

title: Check Perfect Square
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a perfect square.
output: true if n is a perfect square, false otherwise

title: Find Intersection of Two Arrays
problem: Write a function that finds the intersection of two arrays (common elements).
output: An array of common elements (duplicates allowed)

title: Generate Pascal's Triangle Row
problem: Write a function that generates the nth row of Pascal's Triangle (0-based index).
output: The nth row as an array

title: Count Negative Numbers
problem: Write a function that counts the number of negative numbers in an array.
output: The count of negative numbers

title: Remove Vowels
problem: Write a function that removes all vowels from a string.
output: The string without vowels (a, e, i, o, u, case-insensitive)

title: Find Majority Element
problem: Write a function that finds the majority element in an array (appears more than n/2 times). Assume it always exists.
output: The majority element

title: Check if Pangram
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is a pangram (contains every letter of the alphabet at least once).
output: true if a pangram, false otherwise (case-insensitive, ignore non-letters)

test_cases.input: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

title: Find Middle Element
problem: Write a function that returns the middle element of an array. If the length is even, return the average of the two middle elements.
output: The middle element or average of two middle elements (as a float if needed)

title: Check if Power of Three
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a power of 3.
output: true if n is a power of 3, false otherwise

title: Sum of Array Except Self
problem: Write a function that returns an array where each element is the sum of all numbers in the input array except the one at that index.
output: The resulting array

title: Trim Spaces
problem: Write a function that trims leading and trailing spaces from a string.
output: The string without leading or trailing spaces

title: Find Kth Largest Element
problem: Write a function that finds the kth largest element in an array (1-based index).
input: An array of integers arr and an integer k
output: The kth largest element

title: Check if Valid Email
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid email (simplified: contains '@', '.', and no spaces).
output: true if valid email format, false otherwise

title: Sum of Odd Numbers
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of all odd numbers in an array.
output: The sum of odd numbers

title: Find Common Prefix
problem: Write a function that finds the longest common prefix among an array of strings.
output: The longest common prefix

title: Check if Binary String
problem: Write a function that checks if a string contains only '0' and '1' characters.
output: true if binary, false otherwise

title: Find Max Consecutive Characters
problem: Write a function that finds the length of the longest sequence of the same character in a string.
output: The length of the longest sequence

title: Sum of Squares
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of squares of numbers in an array.
output: The sum of squares

title: Check if Leap Year
problem: Write a function that checks if a year is a leap year.
output: true if leap year, false otherwise

title: Reverse Array in Place
problem: Write a function that reverses an array in place.
output: The reversed array

title: Count Words
problem: Write a function that counts the number of words in a string (words separated by spaces).
output: The number of words

title: Find Closest Number to Zero
problem: Write a function that finds the number closest to zero in an array. If there’s a tie, return the positive one.
output: The closest number to zero

title: Check if Perfect Number
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a perfect number (equal to the sum of its proper divisors).
output: true if a perfect number, false otherwise

title: Find Median of Array
problem: Write a function that finds the median of an array of integers (assume sorted for simplicity).
input: A sorted array of integers arr
output: The median (average of two middle elements if even length)

title: Convert to Title Case
problem: Write a function that converts a string to title case (first letter of each word capitalized, rest lowercase).
output: The string in title case

title: Find Next Greater Element
problem: Write a function that finds the next greater element for each element in an array (or -1 if none exists).
output: An array of next greater elements

title: Check if Armstrong Number
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is an Armstrong number (sum of its digits raised to the power of number of digits equals the number).
output: true if an Armstrong number, false otherwise

title: Rotate String Left
problem: Write a function that rotates a string left by k positions.
input: A string s and an integer k
output: The rotated string

title: Find Smallest Positive Missing
problem: Write a function that finds the smallest positive integer missing from an array.
output: The smallest positive missing integer

title: Count Digits
problem: Write a function that counts the number of digits in an integer.
output: The number of digits

title: Check if All Unique
problem: Write a function that checks if all characters in a string are unique.
output: true if all characters are unique, false otherwise

title: Find Third Maximum
problem: Write a function that finds the third maximum number in an array. Return the maximum if less than 3 distinct numbers exist.
output: The third maximum number

title: Sum of First N Numbers
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of the first n natural numbers.
output: The sum of numbers from 1 to n, or 0 if n <= 0

title: Check if Rotation
problem: Write a function that checks if one string is a rotation of another.
output: true if s2 is a rotation of s1, false otherwise

title: Find Max Product of Two Elements
problem: Write a function that finds the maximum product of any two elements in an array.
output: The maximum product, or -1 if less than 2 elements

title: Count Triplets with Sum
problem: Write a function that counts triplets in an array whose sum equals a target.
input: An array of integers arr and an integer target
output: The number of triplets

title: Check if Valid Phone Number
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid phone number (simplified: 10 digits, optional dashes).
output: true if valid phone number, false otherwise

title: Find Longest Palindromic Substring Length
problem: Write a function that finds the length of the longest palindromic substring in a string.
output: The length of the longest palindromic substring

title: Check if Happy Number
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a happy number (sum of squares of digits eventually reaches 1).
output: true if a happy number, false otherwise

title: Sum of Two Largest Elements
problem: Write a function that finds the sum of the two largest elements in an array.
output: The sum of the two largest elements, or -1 if less than 2 elements

problem: Write a function that checks if a string of '(', ')', and '*' (wildcard) can form a valid parentheses sequence.
output: true if valid, false otherwise

title: Find Max Depth of Nested Parentheses
problem: Write a function that finds the maximum depth of nested parentheses in a string.
output: The maximum depth

title: Count Set Bits
problem: Write a function that counts the number of 1s in the binary representation of an integer.
output: The number of set bits

title: Find First Unique Character
problem: Write a function that finds the index of the first unique character in a string (0-based).
output: The index of the first unique character, or -1 if none

title: Check if Power of Four
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is a power of 4.
output: true if a power of 4, false otherwise

title: Find Sum of Left Leaves
problem: Write a function that finds the sum of all left leaf nodes in a binary tree (simplified as an array representation).
input: An array representing a binary tree (level-order)
output: The sum of left leaves

title: Reverse Vowels
problem: Write a function that reverses the order of vowels in a string, keeping other characters in place.
output: The string with vowels reversed

title: Find Single Number
problem: Write a function that finds the number that appears once in an array where every other number appears twice.
output: The single number

title: Check if Valid Anagram with One Edit
problem: Write a function that checks if two strings can be anagrams with at most one character edit.
output: true if possible, false otherwise

title: Find Max Sum Subarray
problem: Write a function that finds the maximum sum of any contiguous subarray.
output: The maximum sum

title: Count Palindromic Substrings
problem: Write a function that counts the number of palindromic substrings in a string.
output: The number of palindromic substrings

problem: Write a function that finds the length of the longest common subsequence between two strings.
output: The length of the longest common subsequence

title: Check if Valid Sudoku Row
problem: Write a function that checks if a row (array) from a Sudoku grid is valid (contains digits 1-9 without repetition, ignoring '.').
output: true if valid, false otherwise

title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
problem: Write a function that finds the minimum element in a rotated sorted array.
output: The minimum element

title: Count Elements Greater Than X
problem: Write a function that counts how many elements in an array are greater than a given value x.
input: An array of integers arr and an integer x
output: The count of elements greater than x

title: Find Peak Element
problem: Write a function that finds a peak element in an array (greater than its neighbors). Return any peak if multiple exist.
output: The index of a peak element

title: Convert Roman to Integer
problem: Write a function that converts a Roman numeral string to an integer.
output: The integer value

title: Find Duplicate Number
problem: Write a function that finds a duplicate number in an array containing n+1 integers where each integer is between 1 and n.
output: The duplicate number

problem: Write a function that checks if a string can be a palindrome by removing at most one character.
output: true if possible, false otherwise

title: Find Longest Increasing Subsequence Length
problem: Write a function that finds the length of the longest increasing subsequence in an array.
output: The length of the longest increasing subsequence

title: Count Squares
problem: Write a function that counts the number of square numbers less than or equal to n.
output: The count of square numbers

title: Find Longest Word with Prefix
problem: Write a function that finds the longest word in an array that starts with a given prefix.
input: An array of strings arr and a string prefix
output: The longest word with the prefix, or '' if none

title: Find Shortest Word
problem: Write a function that finds the shortest word in a sentence. If multiple words have the same length, return the first one.
input: A string s containing words separated by spaces
output: The shortest word

title: Check if Divisible by Sum
problem: Write a function that checks if a number is divisible by the sum of its digits.
output: true if n is divisible by the sum of its digits, false otherwise

title: Find Most Frequent Element
problem: Write a function that finds the most frequent element in an array. If there’s a tie, return the smallest one.
output: The most frequent element

title: Check if String is Alternating
problem: Write a function that checks if a string alternates between uppercase and lowercase letters.
output: true if alternating, false otherwise

title: Find Closest Pair Sum
problem: Write a function that finds the sum of two elements in an array closest to a target value.
input: An array of integers arr and an integer target
output: The sum closest to the target

title: Find Largest Divisor
problem: Write a function that finds the largest proper divisor of a number (excluding the number itself).
output: The largest proper divisor

title: Check if String is Interleaved
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is an interleaving of two other strings (maintains relative order).
input: Three strings s1, s2, and s3
output: true if s3 is an interleaving of s1 and s2, false otherwise

title: Sum of Absolute Differences
problem: Write a function that calculates the sum of absolute differences between consecutive elements in an array.
output: The sum of absolute differences

title: Find Max Circular Subarray Sum
problem: Write a function that finds the maximum sum of a subarray in a circular array (can wrap around).
output: The maximum circular subarray sum

title: Check if String is Valid Number
problem: Write a function that checks if a string represents a valid number (integer or decimal, optional sign).
output: true if a valid number, false otherwise

title: Find Number of Divisors
problem: Write a function that calculates the total number of divisors of a given integer.
output: The total number of divisors

title: Check if String is Valid Parentheses Subsequence
problem: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid subsequence of balanced parentheses (can skip characters).
input: A string s containing '(', ')', and other characters
output: true if a valid parentheses subsequence exists, false otherwise

title: Find Minimum Moves to Equal Elements
problem: Write a function that finds the minimum number of moves to make all array elements equal by incrementing n-1 elements by 1 per move.
output: The minimum number of moves
